thread.title: IN THE PAPERS - Carton rouge for Platini
thread.title_full: IN THE PAPERS - Carton rouge for Platini - France 24

author: Nicholas RUSHWORTH
title: IN THE PAPERS - Carton rouge for Platini
text:
Platini given a red card. "Carton rouge," says Le Parisien-Aujourd'hui-en-France. The French football star is "not the exemplary leader FIFA needs" it says. Platini on Thursday was suspended for three months by FIFA's Ethics Committee along with FIFA boss Sepp Blatter. We also look at coverage of Russia's military offensive in Syria. And, at a key French institution, the National Administration School(ENA)attended by the likes of Hollande and Fabius, which is marking 70 years since its founding. By Nicholas RUSHWORTH
Follow us
